items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

beer.beer_description: Satisfies your tastes while keeping your senses sharp. Brewed with a complex array of ingredients. Balanced for optimal aromatics and a clean finish.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 360 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 73!
Keep the party rolling all day long with your favorite low ABV session IPAs. That's 75 different beers with style of IPA - Session. Try 5 more for Level 16!

beer.beer_description: Satisfies your tastes while keeping your senses sharp. Brewed with a complex array of ingredients. Balanced for optimal aromatics and a clean finish.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 55 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 12!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 55 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 12! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

As the hub of the town's social scene, your local pub has what you're craving. Be sure to stop by for a pint or two! That's a beer at 5 different venues with the categories of Pub, Irish Pub or Gastropub. Visit 5 more for Level 2!

beer.beer_description: Satisfies your tastes while keeping your senses sharp. Brewed with a complex array of ingredients. Balanced for optimal aromatics and a clean finish.

items.badge_description: Planning on calling out tomorrow? If not, we’ll be sure to have some coffee ready for you! Drink 5 beers during the week after 10PM (to midnight).

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 40 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 4! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_description: Satisfies your tastes while keeping your senses sharp. Brewed with a complex array of ingredients. Balanced for optimal aromatics and a clean finish.

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 10 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 15 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 4!
